item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, I am currently pursuing bachelors in Electrical engineering and Computer Sciences at IIT Kanpur. Initially, I grew up in a small town in uttarakhand, then moved to BVM a Boarding school in Nainital. After high school, I decided to pursue engineering and somehow ended up here today. I have always been a curious person and enjoyed learning new things. My Interests mostly originate when I come across excellent resources on any subject, a lot on internet thesedays , especially during infamous COVID lockdown.

item.title: Course-work
item.description: Below follows a brief summary of coursework, I did at IIT Kanpur during my UG studies First sem Real Analysis and multivariable calculus Mechanics Engineering Drawing Introduction to biology Physics Laboratory Introduction to Indian Philosophy Second sem Linear algebra and ODE Electrodynamics General chemistry Fundamentals of Computing Chemistry Laboratory Third sem Data Structures and Algorithms Introduction to Electronics Signal , systems and Networks Introduction to political Philosophy Complex Analysis Partial Differential Equations Fourth sem Analog Electronics Control System Analysis Modern Cryptology Introduction to Electrical Engineering Probability And Statistics Fifth sem Digital Electronics Principles of Communication Power systems Design and Analysis of Algorithms Theory of Computation
